QuestData.Title: Out of the Blue
QuestData.Description:
Did you see that?!
This winged creature just fell from the sky! I don't know what sort of being it is, but it certainly isn't native to the Isles.
Wait... I do remember a punchy little goblin asking for directions to the Bluefeather Cliffs just above us. You think she would know anything about it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Harleen Chirpsnide in the Bluefeather Cliffs.
QuestData.RewardText: Some guard in Gelikyr told you I'd be here? Did they say I own 'em any money?
